value.title: MC vs Stephano in a $40 000 StarCraft 2 Legends Tournament Finals!
value.excerpt: Stephano vs MC in a best-of-5 series of StarCraft 2. This SC2 Legends showmatch was played at Gamers8 alongside the StarCraft: Brood War Legends tournament as well as the StarCraft 2 main event. These players used to play at the highest level of the game literally a decade ago. How good are they in 2023?
